item.title: Alaska Airlines News Room
item.description:
Alaska Airlines News Room

New flights offer Orange County customers low fares and non-stop service SEATTLE - Today Alaska Airlines will begin new service from Orange County to Santa Rosa/Sonoma County, California and Reno/Tahoe, Nevada. These new routes eliminates the need to connect through other cities and marks the first time Alaska Airlines has provided service between Reno and Orange County, which is the second most popular destination from Reno.

item.title: So Much for Drowning Your Sorrows - Drinkers Drink in Good Times More Than Bad
item.description:
So Much for Drowning Your Sorrows - Drinkers Drink in Good Times More Than Bad

A recent Harris Poll looked at what situations have Americans (aged 21+) reaching for an adult beverage, and more specifically, which ones they're reaching for. The answers were a bit surprising. Among those who drink alcohol at least a few times a year, adults are more likely to imbibe when faced with a good situation compared to a bad one.

item.title: Explore the Sierra Foothills on a California Wines Road Trip
item.description:
Explore the Sierra Foothills on a California Wines Road Trip

March 15, 2016 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- dozens of scenic wine regions offer an exceptional variety of experiences and wines to enjoy. To help visitors explore them all, Wine Institute's California Wines Road Trips series highlights a different region each month. For March, the spotlight shines on regions in the western foothills of Sierra Nevada mountains.

item.title: Don't Be Afraid: Be an Artichoke Adventurer
item.description:
Don't Be Afraid: Be an Artichoke Adventurer

March 16, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- Research shows that some people are intimidated by eating artichokes, but hopefully not the adventurous who will enjoy the fresh vegetable that is all heart. Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20160316/344794 This spring Ocean Mist Farms, the largest grower of fresh artichokes in , is inviting home cooks to Be an Artichoke Adventurer.

item.title: 2016 Ferrari California T HS first drive: A grander GT
item.description:
2016 Ferrari California T HS first drive: A grander GT

The Ferrari California T is certainly stylish and grand but it's too wimpy for some -- not exciting enough to drive, it doesn't corner as well as some owners might have liked, even though it is a Ferrari down to the very last aluminum bolt and optional carbon fiber cupholder.

item.title: Why You Should Skip the Wine-Pairing Menu
item.description:
Why You Should Skip the Wine-Pairing Menu

DOW JONES, A NEWS CORP COMPANY News Corp is a network of leading companies in the worlds of diversified media, news, education, and information services. With high prices, frequently uninspired choices, tiny pours and lectures before every course, wine pairings are more often vinous straitjackets than perfect matches A FEW WEEKS AGO my neighbor John stopped me as I was walking past his house.

item.title: I know I'm drinking a great Pinot when... Quick Tip with Luisa Ponzi
item.description:
I know I'm drinking a great Pinot when... Quick Tip with Luisa Ponzi

How can you tell when you're drinking a great wine? Get a quick answer from Luisa Ponzi, winemaker at Ponzi Vineyards in Oregon's Willamette Valley.
